section.title:
work order material requirements returning individually
work orders return material item from Return W/O Material Item
section.para: To return Work Order materials to Inventory individually, select the "Return W/O Material Item" option. The following screen will appear:
When returning Work Order materials to Inventory individually, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the Work Order whose materials you want to return to Inventory individually.
Displays Site code automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Work Order Status automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Indicates whether selected Work Order is an Assembly or Disassembly Work Order.
Select one of the individual component Items for the specified Item.
Displayed value represents the quantity of the component Item required per parent Item.
Displayed value represents the allotted Scrap percentage for the component Item when manufacturing the parent Item.
Required: Displayed value represents the quantity required to fulfill the specified Work Order.
Issued: Displayed value represents the quantity issued in fulfillment of the specified Work Order.
to Return: Enter the amount of the component Item to be returned to Inventory.
Total Quantity on Hand prior to the issue will be displayed.
Total Quantity on Hand after the proposed issue will be displayed.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without returning the Work Order component Item to Inventory, returning you to the application desktop.
Returns the material for the specified component Item to Inventory.
